name: Free Rider GhostDog
description:
OK..OK.. yes I have re-uploaded FR2GD.

FREE RIDER GHOST DOG!

I created this itch.io account just to upload Free Rider Ghost dog, expect to see NO updates and NO  development

 I did not make this game nor am I going to say who made it. but all rights to the original creator

I made this account with 10 minute mail and I don't know the password so once I log out It will hopefully be up forever

I re-uploaded this out of my anger, kano apps took the original down because of copy right (I think). and I hope this will make anti gravity and teleporters fun for people who didn't download the original
